Plot: After a long spell of exile, Sparhawk, Pandion Knight and the Queen's champion returns to native land to find it overrun with evil and intrigue - and his young queen greviously ill. Indeed, Ehlana lies magically entombed within a block of crystal, doomed to die unless a cure can be found within a year.
Characters: Francis Flute, Sparhawk, Ehlana, Kurik, Sephrenia, Vanion, Kalten, Bevier, Tynian, Ulath
